title: About Me
text:
Graduate Student | Data Science | Sports Fan | Lifelong Learner
Welcome! I‚Äôm Chad Johnson, a graduate student studying Data Science with a background in accounting. I love learning new things, solving problems, and finding meaningful ways to apply data-driven insights to real-world challenges.


I‚Äôve always been curious about numbers and patterns, which led me to study accounting during my undergrad. Now, as I pursue my Master‚Äôs in Data Science, I‚Äôm excited to combine my business knowledge with powerful analytical tools to make an impact in the field.
Beyond academics, I enjoy teaching and mentoring others. In my free time, you‚Äôll find me running, playing pickleball, or following major sports like college football, the NFL, MLB, and college basketball.




Expanding My Data Science Portfolio: I‚Äôm building projects focused on visualization, predictive modeling, and automation.
BookVista Bookkeeping: I run a small business on the side helping service-based industries manage their financial operations.
Exploring New Opportunities: I‚Äôm seeking ways to apply my skills in data science to meaningful, real-world applications.




I‚Äôm always open to learning, collaborating, and meeting new people. Feel free to reach out on LinkedIn or check out my work on GitHub.
